explains: n. 半导体；半导体装置

semiconductor physics 半导体物理学

sentences.en: In semiconductor receivers transistors take the place of vacuum tubes.
sentences.cn: 在半导体收音机中晶体管代替了真空管。

sentences.en: Instead, semiconductor firms simply squeezed more patents out of existing research and development expenditures.
sentences.cn: 相反，半导体公司只是从现有的研发支出中榨取更多的专利。

sentences.en: The technology of amplifying solar energy can save the number of semiconductor materials required for photovoltaic cells.
sentences.cn: 通过放大太阳能的技术可以节约光伏电池所需的半导体材料的数量。
